title: Strictly stars 'are hit by a sickness bug putting the live show in jeopardy'
text:
Strictly Come Dancing's stars have reportedly been hit by a sickness bug that's putting Saturday's live show in jeopardy.

A source told The Daily Star that several stars have been hit by the bug which has spread quickly behind the scenes, with contestant Catherine Tyldesley admitting she's determined she's been trying to dodge 'the lurgy.'

It comes after head judge Shirley Ballas took to Instagram last week to reveal that she had put herself on a vitamin trip, after a 'tough' week left her feeling 'under the weather.'

Drama:~ Strictly Come Dancing's stars have reportedly been hit by a sickness bug that's putting Saturday's live show in jeopardy

A source said: 'When someone gets sick it quickly spreads through the cast.

'Lots of people have been under the weather but the show must go on.'

The publication also said the producers have stocked up on medicine for sick cast members and have encouraged everyone to sanitise their hands regularly.

Close call: A source claimed that several stars have been hit by the bug which has spread quickly behind the scenes (the cast pictured during the live show)

Unwell: Star Catherine Tyldesley said that she has been feeling under the weather, but is still determined to perform on Saturday with pro Johannes Radebe (pictured)

Meanwhile Catherine admitted that she's feeling under the weather, but is determined to still dance on Saturday with pro Johannes Radebe.

'The lurgy has been doing the rounds at Strictly for weeks. It's been trying to get me but it won't win!'

MailOnline has contacted representatives for Strictly Come Dancing for comment.

Struggling: It comes after head judge Shirley Ballas took to Instagram last week to reveal she put herself on a vitamin drip to ensure that she was 'right as rain' for the live shows.

It comes after head judge Shirley took to Instagram last week to reveal she put herself on a vitamin drip to ensure that she was 'right as rain' for the live shows.

She wrote: 'very happy to receive this drip today to help me get well. Full of all sorts of things vitamin c magnesium b12 and the list goes on.

'Feeling under the weather today as a result of a tough week. So @revivuk will have me up and running by Saturday.'

Several weeks earlier, Karim Zeroual was forced to miss an appearance on Strictly: It Takes Two after falling ill with the sickness bug.
description: A source claimed that several stars have been hit by the bug, with Catherine admitting she's determined to dodge it. Karim Zeoual was forced to pull out of an appearance on It Takes Two after falling ill.
